alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 1:53AM CDT until March 25 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM EDT FOR CENTRAL HAMILTON COUNTY... At 253 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairmount, or 11 miles southeast of Dunlap, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Soddy-Daisy, Walden, Lakesite, Ridgeside, Harrison, Red Bank, Flat Top Mountain, Lookout Mountain and North Chickamauga Creek Gorge. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 5. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
